install.name: AcySMS : Subscription Module
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2013 ACYBA SARL - All rights reserved.

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: effect
param.label: SMS_DISPLAY_EFFECT
param.description: Select the effect you want to add to your module

param.name: groups
param.label: SMS_VISIBLE_GROUPS
param.description: The following selected groups will be added on the Module and will be visible (if they are not selected as automatically subscribed to).

param.name: hiddengroups
param.label: SMS_AUTO_SUBSCRIBE_TO
param.description: The user will be automatically subscribed to the selected groups. They won't be displayed on your module but if the user subscribes, he will be subscribed to those groups as well

param.name: displaymode
param.label: SMS_DISPLAY_MODE
param.description: Select whether you want to display the form horizontally, vertically or without table

param.name: groupschecked
param.label: SMS_GROUPS_CHECKED_DEFAULT
param.description: The selected groups will be checked by default on your module if they are visible.

param.name: checkmode
param.label: SMS_CHECKED_MODE
param.description: If you select the first option - Show user's subscription status - only the groups that the logged-in user is subscribed to will be checked. This option has an effect on logged-in users only so you can choose whether you want to display his own subscription or always the default one.

param.name: dropdown
param.label: SMS_DROPDOWN_GROUPS
param.description: Display the visible groups in a dropdown

param.name: overlay
param.label: SMS_DESC_OVERLAY
param.description: Add the description of each visible group as an overlay of the group name. Be careful, you might have conflicts using this option if you have some flash elements on your website.

param.name: customfields
param.label: SMS_DISP_FIELDS
param.description: Select the fields you want to display on your subscription module

param.name: firstnametext
param.label: SMS_CAPT_FIRSTNAME
param.description: Text displayed on the name field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: lastnametext
param.label: SMS_CAPT_LASTNAME
param.description: Text displayed on the name field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: phonetext
param.label: SMS_CAPT_PHONE
param.description: Text displayed on the e-mail field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: fieldsize
param.label: SMS_FIELD_SIZE
param.description: Specify the size of the phone and name fields on your subscription form

param.name: displayfields
param.label: SMS_DISP_TEXT_MODE
param.description: Display the First name, Last name and Phone number text inside or outside the field?

param.name: introtext
param.label: SMS_INTRO_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed before the form inside a span class=acysms_introtext

param.name: finaltext
param.label: SMS_POST_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed after the form inside a span class=acysms_finaltext

param.name: showsubscribe
param.label: SMS_DISP_SUB_BUTTON
param.description: Display the subscribe button on the module

param.name: subscribetext
param.label: SMS_CAPT_SUB
param.description: Text displayed on the subscribe button. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: subscribetextreg
param.label: SMS_CAPT_SUB_LOGGED
param.description: Text displayed on the subscribe button if the user is logged in. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: showunsubscribe
param.label: SMS_DISP_UNSUB_BUTTON
param.description: Display the unsubscribe button on the module

param.name: unsubscribetext
param.label: SMS_CAPT_UNSUB
param.description: Text displayed on the unsubscribe button. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: redirectmode
param.label: SMS_REDIRECT_MODE
param.description: After submitting the form, the user can be redirected to the previous page or to a custom link (in that case, please write the url in the next field)

param.name: redirectlink
param.label: SMS_REDIRECT_LINK
param.description: If you selected the mode 'Custom Redirect Link', the user will be redirected to this url after clicking on the button subscribe

param.name: redirectlinkunsub
param.label: SMS_REDIRECTION_UNSUB
param.description: If you selected the mode 'Custom Redirect Link', the user will be redirected to this url after clicking on the button unsubscribe

param.name: showterms
param.label: SMS_TERMS
param.description: Display the 'Accept Terms and Conditions' box

param.name: showtermspopup
param.label: SMS_TERMS_POPUP
param.description: If you select 'Yes', the article linked to the terms and conditions will be displayed in a popup, otherwise it will be displayed as a separated page

param.name: termscontent
param.label: SMS_TERMS_CONTENT
param.description: The selected article will be displayed if the user clicks on the link 'Terms and Conditions'

param.name: mootoolsintro
param.label: SMS_MOO_INTRO
param.description: This text will be displayed before the Mootools button in case of you use the Mootools effect

param.name: mootoolsbutton
param.label: SMS_MOO_BUTTON
param.description: Text displayed on the Mootools button in case of you use the Mootools effect. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: boxwidth
param.label: SMS_MOO_BOX_WIDTH
param.description: If you use the Mootools Box effect, you can set the width of the box in this area

param.name: boxheight
param.label: SMS_MOO_BOX_HEIGHT
param.description: If you use the Mootools Box effect, you can set the height of the box in this area

param.name: textalign
param.label: SMS_MODULE_ALIGNMENT
param.description: This option enables you to align the text inside the module

param.name: loggedin
param.label: SMS_MODULE_AUTOID
param.description: Do you want the logged in users to be automatically identified in the module?

param.name: cache
param.label: SMS_MODULE_CACHING
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: includejs
param.label: SMS_MODULE_JS
param.description: How should AcySMS add the necessary JS files

param.name: itemid
param.label: SMS_ITEMID
param.description: Menu ID used in the archive links coming from this module
